title: How to Live As the Vampire Lord - Novel Updates
tags: Ability Steal   Accelerated Growth   Amnesia   Antihero Protagonist   Aristocracy   Artifacts   Calm Protagonist   Character Growth   Charismatic Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Comedic Undertone   Cunning Protagonist   Curses   Cute Protagonist   Death   Depictions of Cruelty   Dragons   Dungeons   Dwarfs   Elves   European Ambience   Famous Protagonist   Folklore   Gods   Gore   Handsome Male Lead   Hidden Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Humanoid Protagonist   Kingdom Building   Knights   Lucky Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Mercenaries   Merchants   Misunderstandings   Mysterious Family Background   Mysterious Past   Nobles   Orcs   Overpowered Protagonist   Religions   Revenge   Ruthless Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies   Second Chance   Servants   S*aves   Spirit Users   Spirits   Stoic Characters   Strong to Stronger   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Transplanted Memories   Ugly to Beautiful   Underestimated Protagonist   Vampires
author: Kim Hyung-jun   김형준
description:
Vampire Eugene -- a sacrificial lamb slaughtered after half a year of running to fulfil the desires of a templar for fame.

He was given a second chance at life after concluding his life with regrets.

'I will never again die the same way. If I really did return to the past, no matter what it takes... I will never regret again.'>
